Determine the number of insurance groups deployed by this Service
@return _index uint number of deployed Group child contracts deployed

nodes.name: getGroupCount

devdoc.author: blOX Consulting LLC Date: 08.26.2019 Interface for Insurance Service/ Group Factory Contract

createGroup(address,uint256,uint256).details: modifier onlyAdmin Approve a secretary and create a new group

params._payout: uint number of Dai paid per claim
params._to: the address being given a secretary role

createGroup(address,uint256,uint256).return: _group the address of the Group contact*

params._index: uint key to return address value in mapping 'groups'

getGroup(uint256).return: the address stored at the queried index. Returns 0x00 if none

getGroupCount().return: _index uint number of deployed Group child contracts deployed

isAdmin(address).return: bool true if the address is an Administrator, and false otherwise

isSecretary(address).return: _index uint stored index of Secretary's Group; returns 0 if none

loan(address,uint256).details: modifier onlyAdminrequire sufficienct balance Extend a loan, in Dai, to a Tanda Group

params._group: the group being given the loan
params._months: the length, in months (periods), the Group has to repay

remitGroup(address).details: modifier onlyAdminmodifier unlocked Remit a single group assuming it is not timelocked

params._group: the address of the group being remitted*

getGroup(uint256).notice: Determine the Group address stored internally at a specific index

getGroupCount().notice: Determine the number of insurance groups deployed by this Service

isAdmin(address).notice: Query an address to determine if it currently holds an Administrator role in the Service

isSecretary(address).notice: Determine if an address is a Secretary by returning the index of their group
